mapper.select: select * from event order by logtime

select count(*) from product
mainCategory = #{categorySelect}
and productCode like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and mainSubject like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and supplierCode like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select * from event
eventStatus = #{eventStatus}
and subject like '%'||#{subject}||'%'
and startDate >= to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and endDate <= to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-MM-dd')

select * from product where productCode in
#{productCode}

with eventproducttable as (select productcode , discountrate , prevdiscountrate from event where seq=${seq}) select trim(regexp_substr(productcode, '[^,]+', 1, level)) as "productCode" ,trim(regexp_substr(discountrate, '[^,]+', 1, level)) as "discountRate" ,trim(regexp_substr(prevdiscountrate, '[^,]+', 1, level)) as "prevDiscountRate" from eventproducttable connect by level <= regexp_count(discountrate, ',') + 1
